label: Example Flow
info:
This Node-RED flow...

1) serves as an example for a simple 
automation between a sending and a 
receiving device. 
Received data is saved to the database. 

2) saves the status of all devices 
to the database

name: Prepare Data for Database
CPU Temp. Automation Function
About this flow
info:
This Node-RED flow...

- Serves as an example for a simple 
automation between a sending and a 
receiving device. 

- Received temperature data is saved 
to the database. 

- saves the status of all devices 
to the database

name: Prepare Data for Database
double click here!
info:
This cpu temperature sub-flow works only when 
you have set up a Biomed IoT Gateway.

To make the flow work:
In the CPU Temp example's mqtt-in node,
substitute 'your_gateway_name' in the
topic structure with your gateway name,
you used during gateway setup.
It should be the device name on the
"Device List" page if you used this name.

name: Temp. Automation Function
Receive and Save Gateway CPU Temp.
Prepare Data for Database
